activity.text: [bug-fix] Now community link dropdown does not flys-off

activity.title: ohcnetwork/landing#15
activity.text:
That was the only issue right? ðŸ˜…

I mean in the issue it was mentioned that user has to come through a desired cursor path so that drop-down doesn't close. I myself felt this weird. So now that's not the case the user can now come from the left side of the community button and and still the drop-down will not close.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/landing#15
activity.text: All set, just added another ref to the header container and appended that ref in the onMouseMove funtion to tell that do not close it when user hover in the left side of the button.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/landing#15
activity.text: Of course I can solve it, and I'll do that.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/landing#15
activity.text: I tried sticking to the style of its neighbouring buttons. All of them were clickable except "Community" that felt a bit off.

activity.title: ohcnetwork/landing#10
activity.text:
I have worked on this issue and made it such that dropdown opens while hover on Cummunity nav link and remains open untill you click outsite the dropdown.
Here is the video link to the working solution: https://www.loom.com/share/575e841ffb6748b0b8489313b5855adb?sid=fc8a4e45-551f-48ee-8e74-f42b87e4c30f

Review it and let me if anything else needed to be fixed
